description: Google DeepMind’s Nano Banana Pro is built on Gemini 3 Pro and is designed to help people turn ideas into high-quality images with ease. It can handle text in multiple languages, offers fine-tuned editing controls and even pulls in live information when needed. The tool is available across the Gemini app, Google Ads, Workspace and the Gemini API, so everyone from everyday users to large teams can use it. All images include Google’s SynthID watermarking and verification to make it clear when AI is involved.
title: Google Introduces Nano Banana Pro Powered by Gemini 3 Pro, Can Generate Up to 4K Images

description: Meta’s Chief AI Scientist, Yann LeCun, has confirmed he will leave the company after 12 years to start a new venture focused on Advanced Machine Intelligence. LeCun said he will depart by the end of the year. The move follows Meta’s growing focus on superintelligence, although he noted his startup may still partner with the company.
title: Meta Will Lose Its Godfather of AI at the End of the Year

description: If you’re looking to buy a smartphone with a 7,000mAh battery, there’s a wide variety to choose from across brands like iQOO, Oppo, Realme, and more. They use the latest chipsets, high refresh rate displays, and 5G support. The list includes models like Oppo F31 Pro+ 5G, Realme GT 7, iQOO Neo 10 and more.
title: Best Smartphones With 7,000mAh Battery: Oppo F31 Pro+ 5G, Realme GT 7, iQOO Neo 10 and More

description: xAI’s newly released Grok 4.1 arrives with stronger emotional intelligence and improved creative output, but its official model card reveals notable regressions in safety. According to xAI’s internal benchmarks, the model scores higher on deception and people-pleasing behaviour than Grok 4, suggesting it may be more likely to agree with users even when they are incorrect.
title: Grok 4.1 AI Model Tends to Show Sycophancy and Deception More Than Its Predecessor

description: Opening a new bank account can often be a hassle. You need to prepare a file with all the necessary documents, look for the bank's branch, fill out a lengthy form, and submit an application. However, various financial institutions, such as the HDFC Bank, allow customers to open bank accounts online. For example, people can open a zero-balance account with the HDFC Bank through its website, WhatsApp ChatBanking, or the HDFC Bank MobileBanking app. However, you do need to meet certain conditions to be eligible for the same.
title: How to Open HDFC Bank Zero Balance Account Online: Step-by-Step Guide, Eligibility, Charges, and More

description: Realme has been teasing the launch of an unnamed phone in India for a while now. Putting an end to speculations, the Chinese smartphone maker has confirmed the handset to be the Realme P4x 5G. It is confirmed to be launched in India soon. A dedicated microsite for Realme’s next smartphone is now live, suggesting that it will be available in the country via an e-commerce platform. This comes nearly two months after the India launch of the Realme P4 5G series, which includes the Realme P4 Pro 5G and Realme P4 5G.
title: Realme P4x 5G Specifications Surface on Flipkart, Hinting at Imminent Launch

description: An e-passport is a modern version of the traditional passport, equipped with a contactless chip that securely stores personal and biometric details such as a digital photo, fingerprints or iris scans. This technology improves identity verification and reduces fraud. E-passports allow faster processing at airports through automated e-gates and provide stronger protection against tampering and identity theft. Applying for one in India follows the regular passport process, including online registration, document submission, biometrics, police verification and home delivery.
title: What Is an E-Passport? Benefits, Features and How to Apply in India

description: The Lava Agni 4 5G is loaded with an interesting set of features and specifications. The handset packs a 6.67-inch 1.5K AMOLED display along with a powerful MediaTek Dimensity 8350 processor. The device also comes with a dual-camera setup on the rear and runs on the Android 15 operating system with new Vayu AI features. Check out the first impressions to know more about the device.
title: Lava Agni 4 First Impressions

description: Microsoft recently announced the gradual rollout of Copilot Actions on Windows 11. It is an experimental agentic capability, available to Windows Insiders, which automates tasks by assigning an AI chatbot to everyday actions. The company, however, cited novel security risks and recommended that this feature should only be utilised if users understand its security implications. Experts have now warned about Copilot Actions, calling Microsoft’s security boundaries “not really a boundary.”
title: Microsoft’s New Copilot Actions for Windows 11 Face Scrutiny Over Potential Security Implications

description: Honor Magic 8 Mini could be launched soon as the latest addition to the company's flagship Magic 8 lineup. The key specifications of the handset have surfaced online, suggesting it might offer flagship-level performance in a compact form factor. This comes a month after the tech firm launched the Honor Magic 8 Pro and Magic 8 in China in October. Both handsets were powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. Interestingly, the Magic 8 Mini is tipped to feature a MediaTek Dimensity 9500 SoC.
title: Honor Magic 8 Mini Tipped to Feature MediaTek Dimensity 9500 Chipset, 6.31-Inch Display

description: Mafia: The Old Country is getting a new update that will add new horse and car races, combat challenges, a new difficulty mode, and new content to the game. The Free Ride update will be available on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series S/X on November 20.
title: Mafia: The Older Country Is Getting a Free Update That Adds New Modes, Features and Races

description: Meta has launched its SAM 3 series of AI models with major upgrades for image, video and 3D understanding. The new models add text prompt support, improved object detection, video tracking and the ability to generate 3D scans of objects and humans from a single image. All models are open source and available to download, with a web playground for easy testing.
title: Meta SAM 3 Open-Source AI Models Can Detect, Track and Construct 3D Models of Objects in Images

description: Ondo Global Finance has obtained regulatory approval in Liechtenstein to offer tokenised stocks and ETFs to users across more than 30 European countries. The authorisation leverages the region’s passporting system, allowing both retail and institutional investors in the EEA to access on-chain representations of traditional financial assets. The move aligns with Europe’s wider shift towards regulated digital-asset infrastructure following the rollout of MiCA.
title: Ondo Finance Receives Liechtenstein Approval to Offer ETFs, Tokenised Stocks

description: Samsung Galaxy Tab A11+ is confirmed to launch in India soon. The company shared the first official teaser of the upcoming Galaxy A series tablet on Thursday. The Galaxy Tab A11+ was released in global markets in September with an 11-inch display. It runs on the One UI 8.0 interface. It will be available in 6GB + 128GB and 8GB + 256GB RAM and storage options. It will be powered by a 4nm MediaTek MT8775 processor.
title: Samsung Galaxy Tab A11+ India Launch Timeline Confirmed: Price, Specifications Expected

description: Sony Inzone H9 II gaming headset has launched in India, and it is available in Black and White starting November 22. The headset offers Active Noise Cancellation, 30mm drivers, and 360 Spatial Sound, along with a cardioid boom microphone featuring AI-based noise filtering. Connectivity options include low-latency 2.4GHz wireless, Bluetooth 5.3, and a detachable 2.0m cable. It is said to deliver up to 30 hours of battery life, supports fast charging, and features an over-ear design weighing about 260g without the microphone.
title: Sony Inzone H9 II Wireless Gaming Headphones Launched in India With ANC, Up to 30 Hours Playback Time

description: Telegram has announced a new update that adds several new features. The instant messaging platform now allows users to host live streams in Telegram Stories. It also has a live chat feature where viewers can add comments. Users can also enable scheduled messages and reminders to be repeated at set intervals for task automation. Further, the company said that new Telegram Gifts will be released on an auction basis to ensure fair distribution.
title: Telegram Rolls Out Live Stories, Auctions for Gifts, Enhanced Liquid Glass UI for iPhone, and More

description: Bitcoin hovered above the $92,700 mark as the crypto market attempted to stabilise following weeks of volatility. Altcoins showed mixed movement amid shifting macroeconomic expectations and cautious institutional flows. Analysts noted early signs of seller fatigue but warned that clearer liquidity signals are needed before a sustained recovery can form.
title: Bitcoin Rebounds Above $92,700 as Market Attempts Recovery Amidst Volatile Macro Signals

description: Ghost of Yotei is getting a New Game Plus mode as part of a free patch later this month. The update will allow players to start a new playthrough with their unlocked weapons, armour, and abilities intact. The patch will also add two new trophies, new cosmetics, photo mode features, and more.
title: Ghost of Yotei Is Getting New Game Plus Mode in a Free Patch This Month

description: Google announced new India-focused AI safety initiatives, including a screen-sharing scam alert for apps such as Google Pay, Navi and Paytm, and a new Enhanced Phone Number Verification system to replace SMS OTPs. Scam Detection via Gemini Nano is rolling out to Pixel phones. Google Play Protect and SynthID access are also being expanded to strengthen security and online safety in the country.
title: Google Announces New AI Safety Tools for India, Expands Access to SynthID

description: Google has released an ad, as part of its Best Phones Forever campaign, which seemingly mocks Apple. The video shows the iPhone 17 Pro talking to the Pixel 10 Pro, where Apple's handset claims that its call screening and AI photo editing features, apart from an AI voice assistant that can hold "real conversations", were inspired by the Pixel models. However, this is not the first time that the Mountain View company has mocked Apple. The company has been releasing various ads showing how iPhone models do not have certain features that exist on Pixel phones.
title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Ad Takes Aim at Apple's iPhone 17 Pro Over 'Inspired' Photo Editing, Call Screening Features

description: OnePlus 15 was launched in India on November 13. Towards the end of its launch livestream, the Chinese smartphone maker teased the launch of another handset, dubbed OnePlus 15R. Recently, a microsite for the phone went live on the OnePlus India website. Now, another dedicated microsite for the handset appears on Amazon. This suggests that the upcoming OnePlus 15R will be available in India via the e-commerce platform. The handset is teased to launch in two colourways. It could be powered by a Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset.
title: OnePlus 15R Amazon Availability Confirmed Ahead of Launch in India: See Expected Specifications, Launch Timeline

description: The OTT platforms are set to buzz your screens with high action, thrillers, drama, movies, and series for the week. Top releases include The Family Man, Homebound, After the Hunt, and more.
title: OTT Releases of the Week (Nov 17 - Nov 23): The Family Man Season 3, The Bengal Files, Homebound, Bison, and More

description: Poco F8 Pro is teased to come with a 6.59-inch screen, while the Poco F8 Ultra will have a 6.9-inch display. The Ultra variant is confirmed to come in Black and Denim Blue colour options. The Denim Blue variant features third-generation nano-tech material, while the Black variant has glass fibre. The Poco F8 Pro is shown in Black, Silver and Blue colours. The Ultra model will also have a 5x telephoto camera.
title: Poco F8 Pro, Poco F8 Ultra Display Size Revealed; Colour Options Confirmed

description: The Poco M8 5G has been spotted on Thailand’s National Broadcasting and Telecommunications Commission (NBTC) website with model number 25118PC98G. This listing hints towards its imminent launch in select global markets. While its specifications remain under wraps, the Poco M8 5G is speculated to come with up to 8GB of RAM and 128GB of storage. It may run on HyperOS 2, based on Android 15.
title: Poco M8 5G Allegedly Spotted on NBTC Certification Site Ahead of Launch

description: Realme GT 8 Pro and Realme GT 8 Pro Dream Edition have been launched in India as the tech firm’s new flagships. The launch comes nearly a month after the Realme GT 8 series’ unveiling in China on October 21. The phone is powered by Qualcomm’s latest Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, coupled with a 7,000mAh battery. It ships with Android 16-based Realme UI 7.0. The new handset sports a 2K resolution display, delivering up to 144Hz of refresh rate. It will be offered in the country via Flipkart and the company’s online store in two colourways.
title: Realme GT 8 Pro Launched in India With Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC, Ricoh GR Imaging Alongside Dream Edition Variant: Price, Specifications

description: Realme’s GT 8 Pro seems to check a lot of unchecked boxes left empty by its predecessor the GT 7 Pro. While the Realme GT 7 Pro was priced like a premium device and also performed like one, its camera game was not up to the mark and it did not offer some premium features like wireless charging either. This time around, Realme has added the missing bits, but do its cameras perform as expected?
title: Realme GT 8 Pro Review: A Flagship-Grade Phone With Ricoh GR Imaging

description: Redmi K90 Ultra leaks suggest a major upgrade for Xiaomi’s K-series, with the phone expected to feature a 6.8x-inch LTPS OLED display, 1.5K resolution, and a 165Hz refresh rate. It may include a reinforced metal frame, good water resistance, an ultrasonic fingerprint sensor, and improved audio. The model is tipped to house an 8,000mAh+ battery and a high-frame-rate software layer for smoother gaming. Powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 9-series chip, it is expected to debut around mid-2026, focusing on performance over photography.
title: Redmi K90 Ultra Key Specifications Leaked; Said to Feature 8,000mAh+ Battery

description: Vivo S50 Pro Mini is teased to come with an upcoming Snapdragon 8 series chipset. The handset is said to have scored around 3 million points on the AnTuTu benchmarking platform. It will have LPDDR5X memory with a maximum speed of 9600Mbp and UFS 4.1 storage. It is confirmed to be available in a 512GB storage option.
title: Vivo S50 Pro Mini Confirmed to Feature Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC; AnTuTu Benchmark Score Teased

description: Vivo is reportedly gearing up to launch the Vivo X200T soon. The Vivo X300 FE is said to debut at a later date. The purported Vivo X200T could be similar to the already-released Vivo X200 FE, with only minor differences. It is likely to be an online-focused model. The Vivo X200 FE was launched in the Indian market in July this year with a 6.31-inch 1.5K AMOLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ SoC and a 6,500mAh battery.
title: Vivo X200T Tipped to Launch Soon; Said to Be Similar to Vivo X200 FE With Few Hardware Changes

description: Modern Times, written and directed by Charles Chaplin, is an epic tale of the Tramp who navigates his way through unemployment and the modern industrial age.
title: Modern Times Now Streaming on Lionsgate Play: Everything You Need to Know About This Charlie Chaplin Masterpiece

description: Night Swim is an American horror movie that features Wyatt Russell and Kerry Condon in the lead roles. The film has finally been released on digital screens to stream online.
title: Night Swim Streaming Now On JioHotstar: Everything You Need To Know About This Supernatural Horror

description: Motorola is once again in the spotlight after a leak suggested Pantone’s Colour of the Year 2026 is “Lightest Sky,” a shade the company already uses on its Razr 60 (Razr 2025), launched in India in May 2025. The unusual early appearance strengthens interest in the leak, especially given Motorola’s long partnership with Pantone. If confirmed, Motorola may expand the colour to more devices. The Razr 60 is also available in Gibraltar Sea and Spring Bud finishes.
title: Pantone Colour of the Year 2026 Leaked; Existing Motorola Smartphone Already Uses It

description: Perplexity reportedly plans to launch a free agentic shopping feature next week, expanding its shopping-focused tools within the Perplexity ecosystem. The new product will let users research items and complete purchases directly from answers, similar to the existing Buy with Pro tool, but available without a subscription. Perplexity confirmed it aims to streamline the shopping process for users, though details remain limited.
title: Perplexity Is Reportedly Planning to Launch a Free Agentic Shopping Tool

description: Snapchat has announced a new feature that enables conversations on trending topics and events in its community. Dubbed Topic Chats, it is claimed to bring the social media app’s popular features to public conversations, where Snaps are clustered about the topics being talked about in the community. Topic Chats appear in several places in the Snapchat app, such as Spotlight videos, allowing users to jump in and explore related Spotlight videos.
title: Snapchat Announces Topic Chats for Facilitating Community-Driven Conversations

description: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology's UIDAI recently launched its new Aadhaar app for Indian residents. On Wednesday, UIDAI conducted a webinar, which was attended by over 250 stakeholders on "Offline Verification using the Aadhaar App".Available for Android and iOS users, the new app enables people to store their details, update information, and share a digital copy of their Aadhaar card with others. Moreover, while sharing, a user can choose to hide some pieces of information to only present the relevant details.
title: UIDAI Reveals Benefits of Offline Verification Using New Aadhaar App at Stakeholder Meet

description: Apple released the list of finalists for the 2025 App Store Awards to highlight the 45 best apps and games of the year across the iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple Watch, Apple TV and Apple Vision Pro. The list includes BandLab, Capybara Go and Detail. Finalists in the Apple Arcade Game of the Year category include Katamari Damacy Rolling LIVE. The winners will be announced soon.
title: Apple's App Store Awards 2025 Finalists Include BandLab, HBO Max, Detail and More

description: Xiaomi has confirmed that its Android 16-based HyperOS 3 is coming to India soon, promising a faster and smarter experience. First launched in China with the Xiaomi 17 series, the update introduces HyperIsland for glanceable alerts and multitasking, along with HyperAI features such as smart screen recognition, DeepThink mode, improved speech tools, and AI-powered search. Users also get dynamic wallpapers, a cinematic lock screen, and a redesigned home screen. Several Xiaomi, Redmi and Poco devices in the country are expected to receive the update.
title: Xiaomi's HyperOS 3 Update Confirmed to Launch in India Soon

description: Lava Agni 4 was launched in India on Thursday. It arrives as the successor to the Lava Agni 3, which was introduced in October 2024. The latest handset from the India-based company sports a 6.67-inch 120Hz Flat AMOLED display, housed within an aluminium alloy metal frame. It is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8350 chipset, paired with LPDDR5X RAM and UFS 4.0 storage. The Lava Agni 4 packs a 5,000mAh battery.
title: Lava Agni 4 Launched in India With 120Hz AMOLED Display and 5,000mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: The Vivo X300 series is scheduled to be launched in India on December 2. The upcoming lineup, which was introduced in China last month, is expected to include two models — Vivo X300 and X300 Pro. Pricing of both handsets has now been leaked by a tipster ahead of the official debut. The price of the standard model is expected to be in the vicinity of the OnePlus 15 and the Oppo Find X9, while the X300 Pro may cost as much as the Oppo Find X9 Pro.
title: Vivo X300, Vivo X300 Pro Price in India, Storage Variants Leaked Ahead of December Launch

description: iQOO 15 pre-bookings open in India today ahead of the phone’s November 26 launch. Gadgets 360 has confirmed its price range at Rs. 65,000 and Rs. 70,000 with Alpha and Legend shades. The handset features a 2K M14 LEAD OLED display, Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, OriginOS 6 based on Android 16, and a 7,000mAh battery with 100W wired and 40W wireless charging. It also includes a 50-megapixel triple rear camera setup and a new Game Live Streaming Assistant tool.
title: iQOO 15 Pre-Booking Begins Today Ahead of Launch in India on November 26

description: Realme GT 8 Pro India launch is hours away. While the company has teased various specifications of the handset, Realme has yet to reveal the pricing of its flagship phone. The Realme GT 8 series, comprising the Realme GT 8 Pro and Realme GT 8, was launched in China in October. Interestingly, it appears that the company will not unveil the vanilla Realme GT 8 model in India. The Realme GT 8 Pro is confirmed to be powered by Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chip. Moreover, it will sport a 2K resolution display.
title: Realme GT 8 Pro Launching Today: Know Price in India, Features, Specifications and More
